Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.controllers

package it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.controllers

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CharacterController
    CharacterController controls the character sub scene that appears in the main scene when a player selects a character image.
    ErrorPopupController
    ErrorPopupController is an error popup that contains an error info and can be displayed when the user commit an error.
    FXMLController
    FXMLController represents a generic controller of a javafx scene or sub scene.
    GameMainSceneController
    GameMainSceneController controls the main scene (gameMainScene.fxml) of the game in the gui
    GenericBackgroundController
     
    GlobalLobbyController
    GlobalLobbyController controls the scene that contains the global lobby table
    PopupDialogController
    PopupDialogController is a dialog popup that ca be displayed on top of the current scene and does not permit to click anything that isn't on the popup.
    PreviousGameController
    PreviousGameController display a dialog scene that notifies the user that he was participating in a game before the server stopped.
    SetupChoiceSceneController
    SetupChoiceController handles the setup phase of the game, from the game started message to the game initializations message
    WelcomeController
    WelcomeController handles the starting scene of the gui, the main menu and the game creation form
